alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 31 at 6:48AM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Locally higher wind gusts may occur on Outer Drive to Hat Six Road on the south side of Casper. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Through 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous, as sudden strong wind gusts will increase the blowover risk of lightweight and high profile vehicles. This includes Interstate 25, and other highways in Natrona County.
info.instruction: Motorists are urged to exercise caution. Lightweight or high profile vehicles will be at risk of blowover. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
